title: Covid-19: Action urged on shielding virus-free nursing homes
description: Over 250 care facilities noted as having Covid-19 clusters, but 60% of homes still clear
content:
Nursing Homes Ireland said the Governments focus must be to ensure that Covid-19 does not enter any residential institutions where the virus has not been recorded to date. 
The representative organisation for nursing homes met Minister for Health Simon Harri… [+12 chars]
